comments: Sequence found by reading the line from 1, in the direction 1, 24,..., in the square spiral whose vertices are the generalized enneagonal numbers A118277. Also sequence found by reading the same line in the square spiral whose edges have length A195019 and whose vertices are the numbers A195020. - _Omar E. Pol_, Sep 13 2011
formula: a(n) = a(n-1) + 28*n - 5 for n>0, a(0)=1. [_Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 17 2010]
crossrefs: Bisection of A001106. [_Omar E. Pol_, Sep 09 2011]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
